skill.name: brand-guidelines
skill.description: Applies Anthropic's official brand colors and typography to any sort of artifact that may benefit from having Anthropic's look-and-feel. Use it when brand colors or style guidelines, visual formatting, or company design standards apply.
skill.summary: Applies Anthropic's official brand colors and typography to any sort of artifact that may benefit fr...

security_audit.summary: Official skill from Anthropic with minimal security review required. Content is static guidelines and styling rules without executable code or external access.

content.value_statement: Your artifact does not match Anthropic brand standards. This skill applies official colors and typography to align with the brand.
actual_capabilities: Applies Anthropic main and accent color palette guidance
Assigns Poppins for headings with Arial fallback
Assigns Lora for body text with Georgia fallback
Cycles accent colors for non text shapes
Selects text colors based on background guidance
limitations: Does not install fonts or guarantee font availability
Provides styling guidance, not a full design system
Best results require artifacts that support text and shapes

use_cases.title: Brand aligned slides
use_cases.description: Style a presentation with official Anthropic colors and fonts for consistent visuals.

use_cases.title: Consistent docs
use_cases.description: Apply brand typography and color guidance to product docs and proposals.

use_cases.title: Polished demos
use_cases.description: Ensure demo materials follow Anthropic brand styling for public talks.

prompt_templates.title: Style my slides
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply Anthropic brand colors and typography to my presentation. Use official accents and keep text readable on light backgrounds.

prompt_templates.title: Brand audit
prompt_templates.prompt: Review this document styling and align it to Anthropic brand guidelines. Update colors and fonts with proper fallbacks.

prompt_templates.title: Poster polish
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply Anthropic brand styling to this poster. Use main colors for backgrounds and accent colors for shapes.

prompt_templates.title: Advanced layout
prompt_templates.prompt: Style each section with Anthropic brand colors, apply Poppins to headings and Lora to body text, and vary accent colors across shapes.

output_examples.input: Style my report to match Anthropic brand guidelines.
output: Headings set to Poppins with Arial fallback
Body text set to Lora with Georgia fallback
Primary text color uses Dark and Light palette
Accent shapes rotate Orange, Blue, and Green
Backgrounds use Light Gray and Light where appropriate

best_practices: Pre install Poppins and Lora fonts for best results
Use light backgrounds for text heavy pages
Reserve accent colors for shapes and highlights
anti_patterns: Mixing non brand fonts with the specified typography
Using accent colors for long body text
Ignoring contrast between text and backgrounds

faq.question: Is it compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes, it provides styling guidance usable across Claude, Codex, and Claude Code workflows.

faq.question: What are the limits of this skill?
faq.answer: It applies color and typography guidance only. It does not redesign layouts.

faq.question: Can it integrate with my existing templates?
faq.answer: Yes, apply the guidelines to your current templates and assets.

faq.question: Does it send or store my data?
faq.answer: No, the skill content is static and does not transmit data.

faq.question: What if the fonts are missing?
faq.answer: It falls back to Arial for headings and Georgia for body text.

faq.question: How does it compare to generic styling tools?
faq.answer: It targets Anthropic brand colors and typography instead of general themes.
